changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text

index.md.Plugin permettant de gérer des coordonné: Plugin for managing coordinates and calculating distance between 2 points, travel time (by car) between 2 points as well as distance
index.md.Une fois le plugin installé et activé à: Once the plugin is installed and activated from the Market, you access the page of the Geolocation plugin by
index.md.Vous retrouvez ici tous vos équipements: Here you find all your Geoloc equipment
index.md.Comme à beaucoup d'endroit sur Jeedom, p: As in many places on Jeedom, placing the mouse on the far left allows a quick access menu to appear (you can always leave it visible from your profile)
index.md.Une fois un équipement sélectionné vous: Once an equipment is selected you get
index.md.L'onglet \" Général \" permet de choisir: The "General" tab allows you to choose the name of the device, the parent object as well as its status and visibility
index.md.L'onglet \" Commande \" permet de rajout: The "Order" tab allows you to add the information we want to obtain
index.md.Une fois l'équipement ajouté, nous avons: Once the equipment has been added, we have the choice between three types of controls
index.md.Représente un point ayant des coordonnée: Represents a point with coordinates that do not change
index.md.Par exemple les coordonnées de votre hab: For example the coordinates of your home, your work ... You just have to note the coordinates in the form
index.md.Si vous recherchez une adresse, alors le: If you are looking for an address, then the contact details will be in the URL address, for example for 25 rue de Mogador
index.md.Vous pouvez également faire un clic gauc: You can also left click on the map, and the coordinates will appear in the small map at the top left
index.md.Représente un point ayant des coordonnée: Represents a point with variable coordinates, the object moves
index.md.Cette commande contiendra donc les derni: This order will therefore contain the last contact details sent until you send new ones
index.md.L'URL pour mettre à jour cette commande: The URL to update this command is
index.md.correspond à votre URL d'accès à Jeedom: corresponds to your Jeedom access url
index.md.Il s'agit (sauf si vous êtes connecté à: This is (unless you are connected to your local network) the internet address that you use to access Jeedom from outside
index.md.N'oubliez pas d'indiquer le port ainsi q: Do not forget to indicate the port as well as / jeedom /
index.md.correspond à votre clé API, propre à vot: corresponds to your API key, specific to your installation
index.md.Pour la trouver vous pouvez soit aller d: To find it you can either go to the Géoloc plugin, it is indicated directly in the URL
index.md.Soit dans le menu \" Général \", puis \": Either in the "General" menu, then "Administration" and "Configuration", by activating Expert mode you will then see an API key line
index.md.correspond à l'ID de votre commande: corresponds to the ID of your order
index.md.Une fois que vous avez donné un nom à vo: Once you have given a name to your Geolocation order, determined its type and saved, a number appears in the "\#" box before the name of your order
index.md.correspond à vos coordonnées sous la for: corresponds to your coordinates in the form Latitude, Longitude
index.md.Il vous faut donc réaliser un HTTP POST: You must therefore perform an HTTP POST on this address by replacing% LOC with your contact details
index.md.pour cet exemple, vous avez besoin de l': for this example you need the Tasker app for Android
index.md.id=net.dinglisch.android.taskerm>). Dans: id = net.dinglisch.android.taskerm>). In the "Tasks" tab, we add a new task here called "Jeedom
index.md.Nous y ajoutons une première action, dan: We add a first action, in the "Miscellaneous" category, we select "Get location
index.md.Nous allons utiliser n'importe quelle so: We will use any source to obtain our position, and we will set a time limit of 30 sec so that Tasker has
index.md.temps d'obtenir précisément nos coordonn: time to get our contact details
index.md.Un délai trop court pourrait ne pas perm: Too short a time frame may not make it possible to obtain contact details or inaccurate contact details
index.md.Il en est de même du type de source: It is the same for the type of source
index.md.Nous ajoutons une deuxième action, dans: We add a second action, in the "Network" part this time, we select "Post HTTP
index.md.Port \" nous copions notre URL complétée: Port "we copy our completed URL except for the% LOC part
index.md.Lorsque nous lançons notre tâche \" Jeed: When we launch our "Jeedom" task, an icon should inform you of the use of your GPS in your notification bar
index.md.Une fois le délai écoulé, nous cliquons: Once the time has elapsed, we click on "test" in Jeedom and the coordinates of our mobile phone then appear in the popup
index.md.Tasker a automatiquement remplacé la var: Tasker automatically replaced the% LOC variable with your contact details
index.md.Il vous suffit à présent de créer un scé: Now you just need to create a scenario in Tasker which will launch this task when you need it
index.md.Par exemple toutes les heures, quand vou: For example every hour, when you connect by wifi…
index.md.Distance, Temps de trajet et Distance de: Distance, Travel Time and Travel Distance
index.md.Permet de calculer la distance, le temps: Calculates the distance, the journey time (by car, using Google Maps) or the distance of a journey (by car, using Google Maps) between two points
index.md.Il est donc nécessaire d'avoir déjà rens: It is therefore necessary to have already filled in at least two commands
index.md.Ici nous avons les coordonnées fixes de: Here we have the fixed coordinates of our house as well as the updated coordinates of our mobile
index.md.Nous pouvons donc calculer la distance e: So we can calculate the distance between the two
index.md.Nous sélectionnons \" Distance \" en typ: We select "Distance" in type and our two previous commands in the options
index.md.Une fois sauvegardé, nous utilisons le b: Once saved, we use the test button and the distance then appears in the popup
index.md.De même si vous voulez le temps de traje: Likewise if you want the journey time or the distance of a journey, it
index.md.Ce plugin fonctionne comme un module, c': This plugin works like a module, that is to say that once saved we can find it in the list of actions or commands, it is thus very simple to use it when creating scenarios for example
index.md.Nous pouvons par exemple réaliser un scé: We can for example carry out a scenario which is based on the distance between our laptop and the house for example
index.md.Dans la partie \" Scénario \", nous créo: In the "Scenario" part, we create a scenario called "Géoloc TV" which allows us to turn on the TV when we are less than 250 m from our house
index.md.les systèmes de positionnement n'étant p: positioning systems are not precise to the nearest meter, remember to take a margin when creating your scenarios
index.md.Dans \" Mode de scénario \" nous choisis: In "Scenario mode" we choose "Provoked" and in "Trigger" we add our mobile
index.md.En effet, c'est lorsque les coordonnées: Indeed, it is when the coordinates of our mobile are going to be updated that we will trigger the scenario
index.md.Nous ajoutons un élément \" Si \/ Alors: We add an element "If / Then / Otherwise" with as condition a distance less than 250 m and as action the powering up of the TV
index.md.Nous n'avons rien mis dans la partie \": We haven't put anything in the "Otherwise" part so nothing will happen if I'm more than 250 m away
index.md.Une fois sauvegardé, nous pouvons regard: Once saved, we can look at the log
index.md.Nous voyons ici que Jeedom a testé la di: We see here that Jeedom has tested the distance between the laptop and the house and since the latter is more than 250 m, then nothing happened
index.md.Pour notre test nous vérifions bien que: For our test we check that the TV is off, the widget shows us 0 watt consumption
index.md.Nous nous rapprochons de notre maison et: We get closer to our house and we start the task on Tasker
index.md.Nous pouvons voir en testant la distance: We can see by testing the distance that it is 0.03 km now
index.md.Nous sommes donc bien sous les 250 m: So we are well under 250 m
index.md.La partie scénario nous informe que celu: The scenario part informs us that it has been launched recently
index.md.Un tour dans le log nous permet de voir: A tour in the log allows us to see that it was launched after updating the mobile phone's coordinates, and that the distance was much less than 0.25 km
index.md.Le plugin de la TV sur l'écran d'accueil: The TV plugin on the home screen shows that it is now powered
index.md.Voilà un exemple d'utilisation du plugin: Here is an example of using the Geolocation plugin
index.md.Bien sûr nous avons réalisé le HTTP POST: Of course we did the HTTP POST from an Android smartphone but it is quite conceivable that a tablet can do the same thing (with the internet) or even a laptop with a script to retrieve and send its details
